Source code for Playground.Python_Staff.Functions_.Minimum

[docs]def min1(*args):
    res = args[0]
    for arg in args[1:]:
        if arg < res:
            res = arg
    return res




[docs]def min2(first, *res):
    for arg in res:
        if arg < first:
            first = arg
    return first




[docs]def min3(*args):
    tmp = list(args)
    tmp.sort()
    return tmp[0]



if __name__ == "__main__":
    print(min1(3, 4, 1, 2))
    print(min2("bb", "aa"))
    print(min3([2, 3], [1, 2, 4], [3, 3]))

    # same think as built-in functions min
